subscription_validity.question: How long is the subscription valid?
subscription_validity.answer: Each subscription is valid for 1 calendar year. You can access your system, and the WhatsApp shipping package is valid as long as you have available credits.

what_is_wafidely.question: What is Wafidely?
what_is_wafidely.answer: It is a startup created and supported by full-stack developers from Mexico, Pakistan, and Ecuador to help businesses engage their customers with automated responses via WhatsApp, providing statistics for appointments or event confirmations.

uses_ai.question: Does the application use artificial intelligence?
uses_ai.answer: Yes, we use AI to automate processes, leveraging various AI tools provided by AWS.

use_my_business_whatsapp_number.question: Can I use my business WhatsApp number?
use_my_business_whatsapp_number.answer: Yes, you can use it when selecting the custom plan. The process to activate your number may take 30 to 90 days.

landing_page_for_marketing_campaigns.question: Can I have a landing page for my digital marketing campaigns?
landing_page_for_marketing_campaigns.answer: When creating your account on our platform, the system will ask you to fill in your business or event information to generate a URL, which can be used for commercial purposes or appointment scheduling.

whatsapp_notifications_number.question: From which WhatsApp number will notifications be sent to my clients?
whatsapp_notifications_number.answer: Notifications are sent from a WhatsApp number approved by Meta for sending notifications. This number is used for all accounts and displays the Wafidely or Wimtut logo and name.

start_sending_appointments_reminders.question: When can I start sending appointment or event reminders and confirmations?
start_sending_appointments_reminders.answer: You can start sending reminders as soon as you register on the platform with the corresponding payment. You can upload a file in Excel or CSV format to import your data based on the subscription plan. The system counts the records and only uploads up to 2,000. If you have more records, you need to contact support.
